main.name: Bruno Díaz Bermúdez
main.bio: My name is Bruno, I'm a Frontend ReactJS Developer with some Backend and QA knowledge. Currently working at Wizeline. I am very passoniate about technology and a fast learner.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I started studying chemistry engineering but changed my career path in the third semester were I started taking computer science related classes, had to pause my career due to financial issues but I am still interested in finishing a Computer science career

work.title: Web Developer/Fullstack Engineer
work.description: Had a big leading role since it was a small studio and had a small team, worked in various areas like participating in data-base design, making various endpoints of Rest APIs, making One-Pages on my own from scratch in very few days for clients with React. Also having constant communication with my team and the client.

work.title: Software Evolution Engineer
work.description: Started contribuing to internal project as a FrontEnd Developer with a big team, then moved to work with a client as a QA engineer despite not having worked as a QA before I quickly adapt, learnt and gave very good results, as a Squad we are doing the best of all in my current project. As a QA I became very familiar with agile metodologies and improving my comunnication with the client and every department of the team.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
